title: Remediating soil salinization with lots of water

content.question: Which of the following procedures would be best for remediating the effects of soil salinization?

choices.label: Application of broad-spectrum biocides to kill microorganisms
Application of superphosphate to increase soil fertility
Addition of clay to increase soil water-holding capacity
Addition of large amounts of water to leach out salts
Addition of lime to raise soil pH

content.answer: Addition of large amounts of water to leach out salts
